description:
vno is deno's first native build tool for
  compiling and bunding vue single file components

create.about:
The create argument will prompt you with messages on the
      command line to roughly create the file structure of
      a simple vno application

build.about:
The build argument will read your vno.config.json
      and run the bundler to create a vno-build/ package

run dev.about:
the run dev argument will run the bundler and host
      a development server

--help.about: prints helpful information on all commands
